verses.verse: And they brought <WH935> in the ark <WH727> of God <WH430>, and set <WH3322> it in the midst <WH8432> of the tent <WH168> that David <WH1732> had pitched <WH5186> for it <WH7126>: and they offered burnt-offerings <WH8002> and peace-offerings <WH8002> before <WH6440> God <WH430>.

And when David <WH1732> had made an end <WH3615> of offering <WH5927> the burnt-offering <WH5930> and the peace-offerings <WH8002>, he blessed <WH1288> the people <WH5971> in the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

And he dealt <WH2505> to every one <WH376> of Israel <WH3478>, both man <WH376> and woman <WH802>, to every one <WH376> a loaf <WH3603> of bread <WH3899>, and a portion of flesh <WH829>, and a cake of raisins <WH809>.

And he appointed <WH5414> certain of the Levites <WH3881> to minister <WH8334> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and to celebrate <WH2142> and to thank <WH3034> and praise <WH1984> Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>:

Asaph <WH623> the chief <WH7218>, and second <WH4932> to him Zechariah <WH2148>, Jeiel <WH3273>, and Shemiramoth <WH8070>, and Jehiel <WH3171>, and Mattithiah <WH4993>, and Eliab <WH446>, and Benaiah <WH1141>, and Obed-edom <WH5654>, and Jeiel <WH3273>, with psalteries <WH5035> and with harps <WH3658>; and Asaph <WH623> with cymbals <WH4700>, sounding aloud <WH8085>;
and Benaiah <WH1141> and Jahaziel <WH3166> the priests <WH3548> with trumpets <WH2689> continually <WH8548>, before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of God <WH430>.
Then on that day <WH3117> did David <WH1732> first <WH7218> ordain <WH5414> to give thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, by the hand <WH3027> of Asaph <WH623> and his brethren <WH251>.
O give thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, call <WH7121> upon his name <WH8034>; Make known <WH3045> his doings <WH5949> among the peoples <WH5971>.
Sing <WH7891> unto him <WH2167>, sing praises unto him <WH7878>; Talk ye of all his marvellous works <WH6381>.
Glory <WH1984> ye in his holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>; Let the heart <WH3820> of them rejoice <WH8055> that seek <WH1245> Jehovah <WH3068>.
Seek <WH1875> ye Jehovah <WH3068> and his strength <WH5797>; Seek <WH1245> his face <WH6440> evermore <WH8548>.
Remember <WH2142> his marvellous <WH6381> works that he hath done <WH6213>, His wonders <WH4159>, and the judgments <WH4941> of his mouth <WH6310>,
O ye seed <WH2233> of Israel <WH3478> his servant <WH5650>, Ye children <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290>, his chosen ones <WH972>.
He is Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430>; His judgments <WH4941> are in all the earth <WH776>.
Remember <WH2142> his covenant <WH1285> for ever <WH5769>, The word <WH1697> which he commanded <WH6680> to a thousand <WH505> generations <WH1755>,
The covenant which he made <WH3772> with Abraham <WH85>, And his oath <WH7621> unto Isaac <WH3327>,
And confirmed <WH5975> the same unto Jacob <WH3290> for a statute <WH2706>, To Israel <WH3478> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>,
Saying <WH559>, Unto thee will I give <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, The lot <WH2256> of your inheritance <WH5159>;
When ye were but a few <WH4557> men in number <WH4592>, Yea, very few, and sojourners in it <WH1481>;
And they went <WH1980> about from nation <WH1471> to nation <WH1471>, And from one kingdom <WH4467> to another <WH312> people <WH5971>.
He suffered <WH3240> no man <WH376> to do them wrong <WH6231>; Yea <WH3198>, he reproved kings for their sakes <WH4428>,
Saying <WH5060>, Touch not mine anointed <WH4899> ones <WH5030>, And do my prophets no harm <WH7489>.
Sing <WH7891> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, all the earth <WH776>; Show forth <WH1319> his salvation <WH3444> from day <WH3117> to day <WH3117>.
Declare <WH5608> his glory <WH3519> among the nations <WH1471>, His marvellous works <WH6381> among all the peoples <WH5971>.
For great <WH1419> is Jehovah <WH3068>, and greatly <WH3966> to be praised <WH1984>: He also is to be feared <WH3372> above all gods <WH430>.
For all the gods <WH430> of the peoples <WH5971> are idols <WH457>: But Jehovah <WH3068> made <WH6213> the heavens <WH8064>.
Honor <WH1935> and majesty <WH1935> are before him <WH6440>: Strength <WH5797> and gladness <WH2304> are in his place <WH4725>.
Ascribe <WH3051> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, ye kindreds <WH4940> of the peoples <WH5971>, Ascribe <WH3051> unto Jehovah <WH3068> glory <WH3519> and strength <WH5797>;

Ascribe <WH3051> unto Jehovah <WH3068> the glory <WH3519> due unto his name <WH8034>: Bring <WH5375> an offering <WH4503>, and come <WH935> before <WH6440> him <WH7812>: Worship Jehovah <WH3068> in holy <WH6944> array <WH1927>.
Tremble <WH2342> before <WH6440> him <WH776>, all the earth: The world <WH8398> also is established <WH3559> that it cannot be moved <WH4131>.
Let the heavens <WH8064> be glad <WH8055>, and let the earth <WH776> rejoice <WH1523>; And let them say <WH559> among the nations <WH1471>, Jehovah <WH3068> reigneth <WH4427>.
Let the sea <WH3220> roar <WH7481>, and the fulness <WH4393> thereof <WH7704>; Let the field exult <WH5970>, and all that is therein;
Then shall the trees <WH6086> of the wood <WH3293> sing for joy <WH7442> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>; For he cometh <WH935> to judge <WH8199> the earth <WH776>.
O give thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; for he is good <WH2896>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.

And say <WH559> ye <WH3467>, Save us <WH430>, O God of our salvation <WH3468>, And gather us together <WH6908> and deliver <WH5337> us from the nations <WH1471>, To give thanks <WH3034> unto thy holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>, And to triumph <WH7623> in thy praise <WH8416>.

Blessed <WH1288> be Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, From everlasting <WH5769> even to everlasting <WH5769>. And all the people <WH5971> said <WH559>, Amen <WH543>, and praised <WH1984> Jehovah <WH3068>.

So he left <WH5800> there <WH6440>, before the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of Jehovah <WH3068>, Asaph <WH623> and his brethren <WH251>, to minister <WH8334> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> continually <WH8548>, as every day <WH3117>'s work <WH1697> required <WH3117>;

and Obed-edom <WH5654> with their brethren <WH251>, threescore <WH8346> and eight <WH8083>; Obed-edom <WH5654> also the son <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038> and Hosah <WH2621> to be doorkeepers <WH7778>;

and Zadok <WH6659> the priest <WH3548>, and his brethren <WH251> the priests <WH3548>, before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH4908> of Jehovah <WH3068> in the high place <WH1116> that was at Gibeon <WH1391>,

to offer <WH5927> burnt-offerings <WH5930> unto Jehovah <WH3068> upon the altar <WH4196> of burnt-offering <WH5930> continually <WH8548> morning <WH1242> and evening <WH6153>, even according to all that is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451> of Jehovah <WH3068>, which he commanded <WH6680> unto Israel <WH3478>;

and with them Heman <WH1968> and Jeduthun <WH3038>, and the rest <WH7605> that were chosen <WH1305>, who were mentioned <WH5344> by name <WH8034>, to give thanks <WH3034> to Jehovah <WH3068>, because his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>;

and with them Heman <WH1968> and Jeduthun <WH3038> with trumpets <WH2689> and cymbals <WH4700> for those that should sound <WH8085> aloud <WH3627>, and with instruments for the songs <WH7892> of God <WH430>; and the sons <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038> to be at the gate <WH8179>.
And all the people <WH5971> departed <WH3212> every man <WH376> to his house <WH1004>: and David <WH1732> returned <WH5437> to bless <WH1288> his house <WH1004>.
